page_content:
Infosys Limited

Data Management, Business Intelligence and Analytics, Big Data

Infosys services cover the entire Data Management spectrum – Strategy and Roadmap definition, Data Governance, Architecture definition and Design, Data warehouse development, Support, Test strategy, Deployment framework, Data migration strategy, planning, implementation, Master data management and Data quality, Data visualization, Data virtualization, Reporting, Data analytics and Big data implementation.

Features

  • 9000+ DWBI Consultants, 1800+ successfully executed projects
  • End-to-end Data Management, BI, Analytics & Big Data Service coverage
  • Best-in-class architecture and technology roadmap
  • Strategy for data governance, data integration, data quality, metadata mgmt.
  • Program governance- org structure, business engagement, delivery excellence, support model
  • CoEs: Technology, Functional and Process Focus groups
  • 10+ Alliance Partnerships with market leading BI Product Vendors
  • Infosys IPs and Solution frameworks for accelerated development
  • High-performance analytics across operational, tactical, mgmt., compliance requirements
  • Strong BI Transformational capabilities

Benefits

  • Experience executing 1800+ DWBI Projects across 13+ industries
  • Alliances: Education-Enablement, Product access, Tech Support, Partner Gateway access
  • CoEs minimize TCO, centralize organization, manage performance, thought-leadership
  • Frameworks, methodologies, best-practices, established governance: Delivery Standardization
  • IPs: M-Fabr1k, iEDPS, iDSS, NZOOM etc. address BI/migration problems
  • Frameworks for Rationalization, increasing BI capability, Big Data adoption
  • Wide range of accelerator toolkits
  • BigData: Big Data Edge, Infosys Information Platform, Data Lake
  • BI Transformational capabilities: Agility, Quality, Adoption ease, Cost
  • BI Factory: Agility, Efficiency, Predictability, Methodology, Cost, Knowledge-Retention

Pricing

£450 to £950 per person per day

  • Excluding VAT
  • Minimum contract period: Other
